title: How to Complete Puzzle 1 7 in Scribblenauts

steps.headline: Look at the given hint: "Help him do his job!"
Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.
Tap on the letters to write solutions.
steps.description:
Give him a chainsaw
Give him a saw
Use a termite at the base of the tree
Give him an axe
Use a beaver at the base of the tree

steps.headline: Use the object on the tree or drag the object to the guy.
Get the starite to complete the level.

text:
Look at the given hint: "Help him do his job!"  Tap on the notebook in the right hand corner.  Tap on the letters to write solutions. Give him a chainsaw
Give him a saw
Use a termite at the base of the tree
Give him an axe
Use a beaver at the base of the tree Use the object on the tree or drag the object to the guy.  Get the starite to complete the level.
